Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47696 affecting package crash for versions less than 8.0.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-47696 affecting package crash for versions less than 8.0.1-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package crash is earlier than 8.0.1-4, affected by CVE-2022-47696
